definitions.definition: A kind of bird, many species of which are colourful and able to mimic human speech, of the order Psittaciformes or (narrowly) of the family Psittacidae.
definitions.example: I bought a wonderful parrot at the pet store.

definitions.definition: A parroter; a person who repeats the words or ideas of others.
definitions.example: What kind of a parrot are you? He just said that.

definitions.definition: To repeat (exactly what has just been said) without necessarily showing understanding, in the manner of a parrot.
definitions.example: The interviewee merely parroted the views of her tabloid.
